de.don.paul

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.don.paul.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Field>

    public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Field>, java.lang.Cloneable
    The base field class which stores the information about the fields
